product_name: Kurgo Quick Release Tru-Fit Smart Harness - X-Large - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Just like you, your K-9 companion needs a safety belt when riding in the car. This 5-way adjustable harness secures to a seat belt, alleviating the distractions a dog can cause in a vehicle.
short_description: Just like you, your K-9 companion needs a safety belt when riding in the car. This 5-way adjustable harness secures to a seat belt, alleviating the distractions a dog can cause in a vehicle.
